arm_group.description: nicotine transdernal patch with the existing polyisobutylene adhesive
nicotine transdernal patch with the alternate polyisobutylene adhesive

brief_summary.textblock:
Bioequivalence study to confirm that a NTS with a polyisobutylene (PIB) adhesive from an
      alternative supplier delivers the same nicotine blood profile as that of the currently
      approved NTS with a polyisobutylene adhesive from the current supplier.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Evaluation of Two Nicotine Patches in Smokers

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  BMI 19-27 kg/m2

          -  smokes >10 cigarettes per day for preceeding 6 months

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  inability to stop smoking during study

clinical_study.official_title: A Pharmacokinetic Evaluation of Two Nicotine Patches in Smokers

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration time curve from zero and extrapolated to the time of last quantifiable sample was determined by plasma concentration time profile of nicotine.
primary_outcome.measure: Area under the curve from time 0 to the last quantifiable sample, AUC(0-t)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples were drawn at several time points: immediately pre-dose, and at 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16, 20, 24, 25, 26, 28, and 32 hours after wearing the patch.

primary_outcome.description: Maximum plasma nicotine concentration was determined from plasma concentration time profiles.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples drawn at various time points including: immediately pre-dose and at 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16, 20, 24, 25, 26, 28, and 32 hours.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma nicotine concentration time curve from zero extrapolated to infinity was determined
secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration time curve between zero and infinity, AUC (0-inf)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples drawn at various time points including: immediately pre-dose and at 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16, 20, 24, 25, 26, 28, and 32 hours.

secondary_outcome.description: Tmax was determined from plasma concentration time profile.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples drawn at various time points including: immediately pre-dose and at 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16, 20, 24, 25, 26, 28, and 32 hours.

secondary_outcome.description: The elimination half-life of drug was determined.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples were drawn at several time points: immediately pre-dose, and at 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16, 20, 24, 25, 26, 28, and 32 hours after wearing the patch.

secondary_outcome.description: Elimination rate constant for nicotine was calculated.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples were drawn at several time points: immediately pre-dose, and at 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16, 20, 24, 25, 26, 28, and 32 hours after wearing the patch.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Bio-equivalence Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Outcomes Assessor)
